"Enjoy the Volcanic Caves on National Da:
"Yoohoo! There's an National Day event in session!
Are you fully enjoying it?
Forget about your daily ARKS duties and go
wherever you'd like to enjoy this limited time off
with complete freedom! How about enjoying some
fiery freedom at the Volcanic Caves?
Refresh yourself by working up a serious sweat!
It's definitely gonna be a good National Day!"
"独立記念日に火山洞窟を満喫！"

"やっほー！　独立記念日イベント開催中！
ちゃんと楽しんでるかな？
日頃のアークスの任務は忘れて
好きなところへ出掛けられる
今だけの完全自由なオフタイム！
火山洞窟でホットな自由を満喫なんてどう？
思いっきり汗をかいてリフレッシュ！
いい独立記念日になるよ、きっと！"
